Class ObservableList<T>

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.application.viewmodel.events.ObservableList<T>
Type Parameters:
T - element type
public final class ObservableList<T> extends Object
Very small observable list wrapper for UI binding.

Unlike a full list implementation, this wrapper keeps an internal list and exposes set/clear/replace methods that fire a single "list changed" event. Use this for simple table refreshes.

    static interface 
    ObservableList.Listener<T>
    Listener notified when the list reference or contents change as a whole.
